text: Mīrāb () is a sub-district located in the Maqbanah District, Taiz Governorate, Yemen. Mīrāb had a population of 14,411 according to the 2004 census.Taiz, census final results 2004 == Climate == Mīrāb has hot deserts climate. == References == Category:Sub-districts in Maqbanah District
title: Mirab, Yemen
